name: Crab Racing!
description:
Made for the GMTKJam

Can you make it big on the crab races? Is it cruel to race crabs? Possibly, but it looks like they're having a good time!

How to Play?

The goal is easy make as many shells as you can betting on the crab races.

At the beginning of each race there's a warm up, and opportunity to observe the crabs and find a potential winner. This is also where you can select a crab and bet your shells, they all have unique attributes. 

When you've made your bets, click the Start Race button to begin the race. If you're lucky you'll get a payout. 

  • First place: 3 times your bet
  • Second place: 2 times your bet
  • Third place: you get your shells back

There are 6 races to a season, good luck!
